en: For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I shall bring back the captivity of Judah and Jerusalem,
hmr: “Ngai ta u, chuong niahai le chuong pha chun, Juda le Jerusa- lem sala an um chu ka ṭhuoikîr nâwk pha chun,

en: I will gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat; and I will execute judgment upon them there for my people and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations: and they have parted my land,
hmr: hnam po po kei khâwm ka ta, anni chu Jehosaphat kâwnah hung ṭhuoi thlâng ka ta, ka ram an sem dar a, hnamhai laia an sukdar, ka mihai le ka rochan Israelhai ta ding chun anni chu chutaka chun khing ka tih.

en: and have cast lots for my people, and have given a boy for a harlot, and sold a girl for wine, that they may drink.
hmr: Ka mihai ta dingin ai an sân a, nawchizawr man dingin pasal naupang an pêk a, uoin an dâwn theina dingin, a man dingin nuhmei naupang an zawr a.

en: Yea, and what are ye to me, O Tyre, and Sidon, and all the regions of Philistia? will ye render me a recompense? and if ye recompense me, swiftly and speedily will I return your recompense upon your own head.
hmr: Anih, aw Tura le Sidon le Philistin ram po pohai, ka ta dingin ieng am in nih a? In mi thung ding am a nih? In mi thung chun, hrâttakin, inhmawtakin in mi thungna chu in lu chung ngeiah thung vêng ka ti cheu.

en: Forasmuch as ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly precious things,
hmr: Ka tangkaruo le ka rângkachak in lâk a, ka thil ṭhatak, ditumtak- hai, in biekin sûngahai in chawi lût vei a;

en: and have sold the children of Judah and the children of Jerusalem unto the sons of the Grecians, that ye may remove them far from their border;
hmr: Juda nauhai le Jerusalem nau- hai khawm an ramria inthawka hlataka in sawn hmang theina dingin Grik naupasalhai kuomah in zawr el sih a;

en: behold, I will stir them up out of the place whither ye have sold them, and will return your recompense upon your own head;
hmr: ngai ta u, in zawrna hmuna inthawk khan chawkthoin insuoktir ka ta, in thungna chu in lu chung ngeiah thung vêng ka tih.

en: and I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they shall sell them to the men of Sheba, to a nation far off: for Jehovah hath spoken it.
hmr: In naupasalhai, in naunuhmei- hai chu Juda nauhai kutah zawr ka tih; anni chun hlatakah Seba mihai kuomah anni chu zawr an ta, LALPA chun a ti tah a nih,” tiin.

en: Proclaim ye this among the nations; prepare war; stir up the mighty men; let all the men of war draw near, let them come up.
hmr: “Hi hi hnamhai lai chun hril dar unla, indona buotsai unla, mi hrât- takhai chawktho unla, indo mi po pohai hung hnai hai sienla, hung raw hai se.

en: Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruning-hooks into spears: let the weak say, I am strong.
hmr: In hnuoi inletna hmawrzumhai kâwlhnâmah sut unla, in thei kûng âtbawngna chemtêhai chu feiah sut ro; mi hrât naw khawm a, Ka hrât a nih, ti raw se.

en: Haste ye, and come, all ye nations round about, and gather yourselves together: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O Jehovah.
hmr: A vêla hnam po pohai, inhmaw unla, pungkhâwm unla, hung tâwl ro; aw LALPA, chutaka chun i mi hrât- takhai infe thlâktir rawh.

en: Let the nations bestir themselves, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat; for there will I sit to judge all the nations round about.
hmr: Hnamhai chu inchawktho sien- la, Jehosaphat kâwna chun hung tâwl raw hai se, chutaka chun a vêla hnam po po hai chunga rorêl dingin ka ṭhung ding a nih.

en: Put ye in the sickle; for the harvest is ripe: come, tread ye; for the winepress is full, the vats overflow; for their wickedness is great.
hmr: In kâwite kei dawk unla, bu sîk a hun ta sih a: hung unla, hung sirsâwr ro; grêp sâwrna khur chu a sip a, bêlhai chu a sip liem a; an suolna a nasa sih a.

en: Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision! for the day of Jehovah is near in the valley of decision.
hmr: Mipuihai, thusukthlûkna kâwna mipui um mur murhai! LALPA ni chu thusukthlûkna kâwna chun a hnai ta sih a.

en: The sun and the moon are darkened, and the stars withdraw their shining.
hmr: Nisa le thla dâm an inthim a, arasihaiin an varna an thup a.

en: And Jehovah will roar from Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but Jehovah will be a refuge unto his people, and a stronghold to the children of Israel.
hmr: “Chun, LALPA chu Zion tlânga inthawkin inrûm dur dur a ta, Jerusalema inthawkin a râwl in- suong a ta; vân le hnuoi inhnîng an ta; nisienlakhawm, LALPA chu a mihai ta dingin inhumhimna nîng a tih, Israel thlahai ta dingin kulbîng nîng a tih.

en: So shall ye know that I am Jehovah your God, dwelling in Zion my holy mountain: then shall Jerusalem be holy, and there shall no strangers pass through her any more.
hmr: Chuongchun, LALPA in Pathien ka tlâng inthieng Ziona chêng ka nih ti hrieng in tih; chuongchun, Jerusa- lem khuo chu inthieng a ta, mikhuol tukhawm fethleng nâwk ta dêr naw ni hai.

en: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the mountains shall drop down sweet wine, and the hills shall flow with milk, and all the brooks of Judah shall flow with waters; and a fountain shall come forth from the house of Jehovah, and shall water the valley of Shittim.
hmr: “Chu ni chun tlâng insânghai chun uoin thlum infartir an ta, tlânghai chu nênetuiin luong a tih, Juda ram vadungtêhai po po chu tuiin luong a ta; LALPA ina in- thawkin tuikhur hung inchik dawk a tih, Sittim varuom chu hung suk- hnâwng a tih.

en: Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence done to the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
hmr: Juda nauhai chunga nunsetaka thawa, an ramah mi thiem thisen an insuo leiin Aigupta ram chu bo a ta, Edom ram chu thlalêr ram ṭâwl nîng a tih.

en: But Judah shall abide for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
hmr: Juda ram ruok chu kum- khuoin um zing a ta, Jerusalem chu suona inthawka suon dang chenin.

en: And I will cleanse their blood, that I have not cleansed: for Jehovah dwelleth in Zion.
hmr: Chun, an thisen ka isâwpfai naw chu sâwpfai ka ta, LALPA chu Ziona chun a chêng zing sih a.”
